name: Flight Sim World
description:
The future of flight simulation has arrived! Choose from our fleet of sleek, highly-detailed aircraft and take-off to exotic places through a variety of spectacular weather conditions. Take on one of our challenging missions, create your own flight plan, or climb the ranks with our authentic LAPL, PPL and Multi-Engine lessons.
Flight Sim World includes:
Seven gorgeous single and twin propeller aircraft
Advanced weather engine powered by trueSKY technology
Immersive lessons and challenging missions to test your skills
Pilot profile which keeps track of your progress
Professional grade Mission Editor for creating your own missions to share on Steam Workshop
Integration of Accu-Feel™ technology
Integration of the critically acclaimed Orbx FTX Global, which provides stunning land and seascapes to enjoy from above
The aircraft in Flight Sim World have been created using the latest modelling and rendering technologies resulting in remarkable detail. Every switch and gauge in the cockpits are clickable, while a wide range of animations really bring them to life.
Latest News:
As part of Early Access we have made some dramatic changes to the skies. By integrating trueSKY technology, Flight Sim World now has an immersive advanced weather system. Volumetric fog and haze add extra challenges to your flight experience, while magnificent sunrises and sunsets wait for you above the clouds!
Free Flight: The whole world is yours to explore in Free Flight mode!
Multiplayer (Alpha): Fly with your friends on Steam! Please note Multiplayer is still in its Alpha stage, so you may experience bugs.
Lessons & Missions: Learn the basics with our LAPL and PPL based lessons, and then test your skills with a series of missions.
Steam Workshop: Create bespoke missions and flight plans using our Pro Mission Tool, then share them with the world. You can also download and play through user created missions and plans. Visit our YouTube channel to find out more about how to use Steam Workshop in FSW!
Early Access
Flight Sim World is currently in Early Access. This means that the sim is not feature-complete and you may encounter bugs. We will be working hard alongside you to resolve issues throughout the Early Access period, so if you see anything that doesn’t look right, please let us know in the Steam Forum or our FSW Forums
